EnhancedContent: To be honest, I find Win11 slower than Win10 and I can't see any improvements. You can't move folders anymore, only copy. Was the upgrade worth it, only to find it more slower and sometimes hangs.
Title: Faster or Slower
Description: ![]() To be honest, I find Win11 slower than Win10 and I can't see any improvements. You can't move folders anymore, only copy. Was the upgrade worth it, only to find it more slower and sometimes hangs.
Author: Perez
